title: Delilah Dirk and the Easy Mark
description: Free online prequel Graphic Story. Delilah Dirk and the Turkish Lieutenant is a light-hearted adventure through the Turkey of the early 1800s and is available in print at the end of August. Unlike the following short story, however, it does not feature such a strong emphasis on cats. Youâ€™re welcome to see for yourself and preview The Turkish Lieutenant at www.delilahdirk.com.
